speaker: Customer
text: You have reached the voicemail of Sarah Thompson. Please leave your message after the beep.

speaker: Agent
text: Hello, Sarah. This is Mark from XYZ Collections. I am calling regarding your past due balance on your account.

speaker: Customer
text: If you are trying to reach me, please leave your name and number.

speaker: Agent
text: You can reach me at 1-800-555-0175. We need to discuss your payment options.

speaker: Customer
text: Thank you for the information. I will get back to you as soon as possible.
